notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: JH L, LH Y, RF L conceived and designed the experiments. RF L, XZ W, Y M, JY W, C M Performed the experiments. RF L, XZ W, Y M, C M analyzed the data. RF L, Y M, JY W, C M contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools. RF L, XZ W drafted the manuscript. JH L, LH Y, Y M, JY W, C M revised the manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
